subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally written as {{zh-l|幎}}: {{Han compound|巾|冥|c1=s|c2=p|t1=cloth|ls=psc}}.

Later the {{lang|zh|六}} was corrupted to {{lang|zh|大}} and the character becomes {{lang|zh|幂}}.

{{lang|zh|艹}} was added to form a new {{Han compound|巾|幕|c1=s|c2=p|t1=cloth|ls=psc|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|冪冪|升冪|冪級數|乘冪|冪䍦|降冪排列|降冪|冪律|冪等|冪定律|冪函數|冪零|三次冪|圓冪|升冪級數|雲冪}}
